DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate paracervical block contain 1 % lidocaine administer prior IUD insertion reduces insertion pain . The hypothesis woman receive paracervical analgesia experience less pain IUD insertion receive analgesia .
DOC.brief_title: Paracervical Block Before Intrauterine Device ( IUD ) Insertion
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 50 year A negative urine pregnancy test clinically unlikely pregnant Seeking intrauterine device indication Willing able sign inform consent English History prior IUD successful insertion Previous fail insertion IUD Known copper allergy Known levonorgestrel allergy Known lidocaine allergy Current cervicitis Pelvic Inflammatory Disease ( PID ) within 3 month Pregnancy within six week prior IUD insertion Uterine anomaly distortion uterine cavity Use pain medication within 6 hour prior IUD insertion Use misoprostol within 24 hour prior IUD insertion
